description: 5 years of historical monthly expense data (2020-2024) with seasonal patterns
source: BLS Consumer Expenditure Survey (modeled for R&D demonstration)
note: 60 months of data per metro enables robust ML training with multiple seasonal cycles

seasonal_notes.housing: Peaks in summer (May-Aug) when demand is highest during moving season, drops in winter months
seasonal_notes.utilities: Higher in summer (AC in hot climates) and winter (heating in cold climates)
seasonal_notes.food: Slight increase in November-December due to holiday season
seasonal_notes.transportation: Higher in summer due to travel season and gas price fluctuations
seasonal_notes.healthcare: Relatively stable with gradual inflation-based increases
